As Radistors hand reached for one of the heads neck, that head reeled 
back avoiding the attack. It then watched as Radistor demerged and 
laughed evily before it opened fire on Trainwreck with two explosive 
fireballs.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Radistor had split up just in time to avoid this, and they didn't 
even notice Aerotaur as they argued with their so-called leader, 
Airbomber. Train Wreck changed to train mode.
> 
> Train Wreck: Shouldn't we go before someone like Aerotaur decides 
to attack us again?...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Rudra656@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Sunday, July 15, 2001 2:00 PM
>   Subject: Re: Clash
> 
> 
>   OOC: I think I forgot to tell anyone I was leaving last week...  
Oh well...
> 
>   ::Aerotaur::
>       He stands motionless watching the battle.  He witnesses 
Sarge's death and 
>   the arrival of the Vile Force.  He sees Gemini Dragon.  He sees 
Radistor 
>   form.  He does not move.  His mind is filled with hatred.  His 
thoughts cloud 
>   as he decides to go after Radistor where he believes Deemos is.  
He takes 
>   flight and in midair separates the two halves of his bladed 
staff.  He tries 
>   to drive the energy blades into Radistor's back.
> 
>
